Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: My Classic Car is a weekly television program that captures America's Love affair with the automobile! Dennis Gage, the handlebar mustachioed host, takes you along for the ride and keeps it entertaining with his unique perspective and enthusiasm for all things automotive. This show has something for everyone. From daily-drivers to Dusenberg's - from local cruise-ins to the most prestigious car shows in the world, this program covers it all!

programme.title: My Classic Car

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey manages to find a Thiokol Swamp Spryte, a rare all-terrain vehicle with a distinct footprint, and rolls it into the shop.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Thiokol Swamp Spryte is back in the shop for some much-needed restoration, and replacing the aluminum skin so she will float again; Stacey rolls in the Lil' Red Wagon for some new suspension and 50 years of Skyjacker history.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the unique story of Painless Performance and how they went from making wiring harnesses in a garage to one of the most influential companies in the automotive aftermarket.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey takes a look at the supercar, McLaren M6GT; with only a handful made, the originals are collectors' items; Stacey reveals the new M6GT component car that can be built from Retroformance.

programme.title: Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey tackles the tired old engine and transmission of the 1999 Dodge Li'l Red Wagon truck.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Whether it's an impossible dream build or installing the latest in aftermarket parts, Gearz host Stacey David can design, fabricate and put it together while helping you learn how to do it yourself.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey and crew take everyone to one of the most amazing drag racing events in the country, the "Night Under Fire" in Norwalk, Ohio.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a well-worn '59 Chevy Apache pickup and shows how to approach a project, whether you are keeping it original or planning on modifying it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey goes out on the rails to take a look at the restoration of the 576 Steam Locomotive.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Thiokol Swamp Spryte is back in the shop for some much-needed restoration, and replacing the aluminum skin so she will float again; Stacey rolls in the Lil' Red Wagon for some new suspension and 50 years of Skyjacker history.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the Joe Dirt side of things and how an old, beat up Daytona made it cool to drive old, rusty junk! After that, he shows what it takes to make a high-end replica of a down-and-dirty car.

programme.title: Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: What do you get when you take a 4x4 diesel pickup, toss in over 2000hp and mix it with some serious bling? The definition of show and go! Stacey looks at a new twist on tool storage, and sets up a Jeep Gladiator for all your outdoor adventure needs!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Stunt Double is back in the shop for its much anticipated reveal and payoff! Inspired by the legendary FALL GUY truck, the Stunt Double is a ground up, frame off build of a classic square body Chevy truck that pays tribute to the stunt world.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in one of the most iconic show cars of the 1970's, the MOD ROD. After that, he shows how to properly disassemble the cab or body of your project, and pre-fit some new components at the same time.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 1970's Datsun 240Z! Follow along as he digs into the history of these legendary cars and shows some of the great ways to deal with the fragile parts and panels. The old Z cars are still out there. Now is the time to get one going!

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling with nomad Michael Ladden and his Drive the Globe expedition vehicle; heading to Utah to go dual sport riding; a look at the Glaciers to Geysers Trek: A Tale of Fire and Ice.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Oregon for the Bend Overland Expo and visits places like Crater Lake National Park; testing the Opus OP15 off-road trailer which sleeps four and has a full outdoor kitchen and solar power to live off-grid.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling to Whistler Canada to go mountain biking at North America's premiere mountain bike Park and going four wheeling; an inside look at project Toyota Tundra build for overlanding.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Hitting Alaska to go four wheeling, helicopter to a glacier to go dog sledding, then trying ziplining and taking a train ride; building a used 2017 Toyota 4Runner for overlanding, and showing why this SUV is so popular.

programme.title: 2026 DAKAR Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Montana to go off-roading; Ken Faught takes flight and lands on a backcountry grass strip near Glacier National Park; testing Forest River's Nobo 16.6 Beast Mode off-road trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team hits Yellowstone National Park to see some natural wonders; testing vintage trailer works XTR off-road trailer and introducing Greg Amendola, a legend in the world of vehicle electronics.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV team travels to Idaho to drive UTVs and ride the latest electric motorcycles; touring Pro Moto Billet where Wyatt Faught did a summer engineering internship; testing a Hiker Trailer built specifically for off-road.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team tackles extreme terrain in Utah before breaking down and heading back to California for some quick repairs; we return to Utah with a new crew and hit infamous places like Swingarm City, Cathedral Valley, Monument Valley and more.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew travels to Nelson Ghost Town outside of Las Vegas and shows you an inside look of a Ford Bronco Raptor build for overland; we also give a recap of our favorite moments during our 10,000-mile Alaska trip.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew tests a Field Van Mercedes Sprinter on a four-state trip through the West Coast; Ken Faught travels to Maui to drive UTVs and then heads to the desert to ride some electric dirt bikes and check out Tim Robel's expedition vehicle.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We head to Sand Hallow State Park in Utah to go rock crawling with the national champ; Rob and Christjen Johnson test electric motorcycles in upstate New York; we head to Cabo San Lucas to explore this special part of Mexico in UTVs.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We go overlanding with a $150,000 Jeep and then show you the maintenance tips for your off-road trailer; accessories for transporting your dirt bike, ATV or UTV in a truck, van or toy hauler trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV

programme.desc: Hosted by legendary broadcaster Dini Petty, "Trailblazing Talks" is a nationally broadcast lifestyle talk television series that celebrates courage, creativity and reinvention. Each episode features a candid conversation to open the heart with a variety of extraordinary guests, from acclaimed artists and innovators to everyday heroes who are defying the odds. Through wisdom, wit and vulnerability, Dini invites audiences to rediscover true purpose, resilience and the beauty of becoming at any age.

programme.desc: Respuesta a los problemas de la actualidad, las adicciones, el abuso, las crisis extremas y sin salidas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Hopefuls Jacob Darien is leading his family through Virginia City when they are accosted. Adam Cartwright and his new traveling companion, Sam Bord, step in to help. Adam offers to escort them, unaware that Sam is planning a robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don't arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher's herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn't ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E19 And the Devil Makes Five While returning from a hunting trip, Lucas and Mark meet Marshal Micah Torrance who is escorting prisoner Scully Potter to trial. Later in camp, Lucas' life is suddenly in danger when a rattlesnake is found in his bedroll. Potter tries to escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Long Winter Cheyenne waits out a long winter with a herd in the northern mountains during a cattle drive. Trouble arises as he finds himself not only dealing with the conditions, but feuding trail hands, a mule, Christmas, and love.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E3 Death Deals the Hand Cheyenne teams up with old Hoot Hollister, who is planning to marry his girlfriend, on a riverboat trip to St. Louis. While aboard, things begin to unravel when they entangle with a teacher and crooked gamblers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E6 Denver McKee While celebrating the return of his daughter, Connie, former lawman McKee is asked to help capture an outlaw gang. While Joe is courting Connie, no one realizes that McKee is actually in with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.desc: S5 E19 And the Devil Makes Five While returning from a hunting trip, Lucas and Mark meet Marshal Micah Torrance who is escorting prisoner Scully Potter to trial. Later in camp, Lucas' life is suddenly in danger when a rattlesnake is found in his bedroll. Potter tries to escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Long Winter Cheyenne waits out a long winter with a herd in the northern mountains during a cattle drive. Trouble arises as he finds himself not only dealing with the conditions, but feuding trail hands, a mule, Christmas, and love.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E3 Death Deals the Hand Cheyenne teams up with old Hoot Hollister, who is planning to marry his girlfriend, on a riverboat trip to St. Louis. While aboard, things begin to unravel when they entangle with a teacher and crooked gamblers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E6 Denver McKee While celebrating the return of his daughter, Connie, former lawman McKee is asked to help capture an outlaw gang. While Joe is courting Connie, no one realizes that McKee is actually in with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law's company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley's father. However, Bubba's reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E21 The Bullet While traveling, Lucas rescues a man named Griff, a corrupt gambling hall owner. When he reports Griff to the marshal, Lucas learns that a missing friend of his is dead and the marshal is using a new science called ballistics to solve the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E22 Requiem at Mission Springs Mark is paralyzed after falling off his horse. When Doc Burrage suggests that warm mineral baths could help him recover, Lucas and Lou take Mark to the old Mission Springs. However, danger lies ahead when escapees arrive.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E2 William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E17 The Road Not Taken Jimmy is hot on the trail of a killer that he has personal reasons for taking down. Jesse decides to tag along. Meanwhile, back at the station, the other riders are upset with Cody about a published story he wrote about them.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Bounty Killers After the marshal who saved Cheyenne's life deputizes him, they travel together to Kansas to bring a prisoner to justice. However, Cheyenne begins to have second thoughts when he learns of the marshal's reputation and practices.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Law Man Cheyenne heads out to investigate a cattle rustling problem. When he arrives, he learns that the local ranchers and his longtime friend have already solved the problem. He decides to investigate further and renews an old friendship with his mentor.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E7 Day of Reckoning Matsou, an outcast Indian, saves Ben's life. Ben gives him and his wife some land. However, neighbor Ike Dagget hates Indians. When Dagget's wife is killed in a raid, he seeks revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law's company. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E23 The Guest A charming man named Mario Rosati arrives at the McCain Ranch and introduces himself as an acquaintance of an old family friend. Lucas and Mark offer him a place to stay for a few days, but they learn that he has an ulterior motive: to kill Lucas.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E3 Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Sacrifice Teaspoon and Jimmy travel to help restore order in a lawless town that The Kid and Lou happen to be visiting. Along their way, they encounter a runaway slave. Meanwhile, a robbery occurs in the town, and The Kid takes over for the sheriff.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Last Trophy A wealthy British couple visits the Ponderosa. The wife soon finds herself attracted to the toughness of the Cartwright men. She begins to think her husband is a coward and sets her sights on attracting Adam.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger It's another busy week in South Alabama for cowboys Bubba, Cody, and Booger. Rancher and expert carpenter Bubba Thompson races to build furniture and prepare his house for his soon-to-be wife, Kaley. Rodeo champion and cattle dealer Cody Harris is struggling to carry on after selling his prized rodeo horse in order to buy a home with his new wife, Misty. And, expert cattleman and horse trainer Booger Brown gets a life changing job offer he must consider. Despite their own worries, Booger and Bubba pitch in to buy a new colt for Cody in order to lift his spirits.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E2 An American Tradition The cowboys of Faith Cattle Company risk their safety while separating a rogue bull from their herd before it breeds with their cattle. Newlyweds and expectant parents, Bubba and Kaley, get their home and lives ready for their baby girl. Retired calf-roper, Cody, must put on a successful rodeo or risk losing a vital source of income for his young family. Booger, the expert horse trainer, gets a call from a distressed neighbor about an unruly mare. Booger agrees to help tame the horse, but if he can't do it, the horse will be put down.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E23 The Guest A charming man named Mario Rosati arrives at the McCain Ranch and introduces himself as an acquaintance of an old family friend. Lucas and Mark offer him a place to stay for a few days, but they learn that he has an ulterior motive: to kill Lucas.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.desc: S1 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger It's another busy week in South Alabama for cowboys Bubba, Cody, and Booger. Rancher and expert carpenter Bubba Thompson races to build furniture and prepare his house for his soon-to-be wife, Kaley. And, expert cattleman and horse trainer Booger Brown gets a life changing job offer he must consider. programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E2 An American Tradition The cowboys of Faith Cattle Company risk their safety while separating a rogue bull from their herd before it breeds with their cattle. Newlyweds and expectant parents, Bubba and Kaley, get their home and lives ready for their baby girl. Retired calf-roper, Cody, must put on a successful rodeo or risk losing a vital source of income for his young family. Booger, the expert horse trainer, gets a call from a distressed neighbor about an unruly mare. Booger agrees to help tame the horse, but if he can't do it, the horse will be put down.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Ape Hoss becomes friends with a man named Arnie. Arnie doesn't realize his own strength and has never learned to control his temper. When a local saloon girl toys with his affections, Arnie becomes dangerous.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E14 The Blood Line Todd Grayson arrives in town and is told that Ben Cartwright had killed his father. Ben shot Luke Grayson in self-defense, but Todd won't accept the truth. He wants to avenge his father by killing Ben.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E10 Vengeance Is Mine Cheyenne is the interim sheriff for the town of Gunnison. He quickly learns that his old friend Ray Masters wants revenge on Rod Delaplane due to a previous debt. Cheyenne must go to extreme measures to avoid tragedy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Sister Rebecca Snipe returns to North Fork after an extended visit. Lucas' son Mark is smitten and plans to play matchmaker for his dad. However, the Snipe brothers get involved to make sure Lucas is good enough for Rebecca.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E10 New Orleans Menace Wealthy Frenchman Cesar Tiffauges, who is used to getting whatever he desires, wants to buy the McCain Ranch. Tiffauges, a sadistic man, abuses his followers regularly with beatings. When Lucas refuses, his son Mark becomes the object of cruelty.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, two men have their getaway plan go wrong. When one bandit takes their one remaining horse and rides off with the gold, the other is captured. Years later, the two men face off in a deadly game of deceit and revenge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. programme.desc: S2 E13 The Ape Hoss becomes friends with a man named Arnie. Arnie doesn't realize his own strength and has never learned to control his temper. When a local saloon girl toys with his affections, Arnie becomes dangerous.

programme.desc: S2 E14 The Blood Line Todd Grayson arrives in town and is told that Ben Cartwright had killed his father. Ben shot Luke Grayson in self-defense, but Todd won't accept the truth. He wants to avenge his father by killing Ben.

Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E10 Vengeance Is Mine Cheyenne is the interim sheriff for the town of Gunnison. He quickly learns that his old friend Ray Masters wants revenge on Rod Delaplane due to a previous debt. Cheyenne must go to extreme measures to avoid tragedy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Sister Rebecca Snipe returns to North Fork after an extended visit. Lucas' son Mark is smitten and plans to play matchmaker for his dad. However, the Snipe brothers get involved to make sure Lucas is good enough for Rebecca.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E10 New Orleans Menace Wealthy Frenchman Cesar Tiffauges, who is used to getting whatever he desires, wants to buy the McCain Ranch. Tiffauges, a sadistic man, abuses his followers regularly with beatings. When Lucas refuses, his son Mark becomes the object of cruelty.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, two men have their getaway plan go wrong. When one bandit takes their one remaining horse and rides off with the gold, the other is captured. Years later, the two men face off in a deadly game of deceit and revenge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E9 Blind Love Jimmy falls in love with a young woman, not realizing that she is married. He finds himself framed for a murder by the woman. The Kid and Lou come to Jimmy's aid, proving that he is innocent of the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E11 Battle Beneath the Mountain For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.desc: A teenager (Tuesday Weld) wants to wear a strapless gown to the prom.

programme.title: Till the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: On opening night of his new Broadway musical, Show Boat, composer Jerome Kern (Robert Walker) reflects on his long career. With the help of his mentor, composer James Hessler (Van Heflin), a young Jerry travels to Europe and soon has one of his tunes placed in a successful production. Back home, Jerry's unceasing efforts result in the production of his first show. Jerry's career blossoms and he works with the best artists of the day while guiding James' wayward but talented daughter, Sally.

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: In this musical romance, lovely Veronica Fisher (Judy Garland) lands a job in Otto Oberkugen's (S.Z. Sakall) music store in turn-of-the-century Chicago. Though the other employees like her, including Otto's clumsy nephew Hickey (Buster Keaton), salesman Andrew Larkin (Van Johnson) -- who is threatened by her competition, and secretly attracted to her -- greets her coolly. Each of them is carrying on a romantic correspondence with an as-yet-to-be-met pen pal. They are both in for a surprise.

programme.title: The Daughter of Rosie O'Grady

programme.title: Bonanza Town
programme.desc: The Durango Kid learns that a supposedly dead outlaw is alive and well and in cahoots with a corrupt town boss.

programme.title: Life Outreach Mission Feeding

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.desc: College trumpet players (Fred Astaire, Burgess Meredith) flirt with a girl (Paulette Goddard) who tries to get them into Artie Shaw's band.

programme.title: Royal Wedding
programme.desc: A brother (Fred Astaire) and sister (Jane Powell) take their act to 1947 London. Includes Astaire's famous dance on the ceiling.

programme.title: Road to Bali
programme.desc: Two vaudeville guys (Bing Crosby, Bob Hope) turn deep-sea divers and save a treasure belonging to a Polynesian princess (Dorothy Lamour).

programme.title: Honolulu Lu
programme.desc: Well-meaning sailors and a conniving uncle place an entertainer (Lupe Velez) in the Miss Honolulu contest under two different identities.

programme.title: Calamity Jane
programme.desc: Wild West sharpshooter Jane (Doris Day) falls for Wild Bill Hickok (Howard Keel) and tries to act more ladylike.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: Viva Las Vegas
programme.desc: All musically gifted race-driver Lucky Jackson (Elvis Presley) wants in Las Vegas is to score enough money for a new car motor so he can win the Grand Prix. When he encounters sexy swimming instructor Rusty (Ann-Margret), he considers staying around longer. After Lucky loses his winnings in the hotel pool, he's forced to remain in Vegas long enough to win back his dough -- but now he also wants to win the Rusty's heart. Unfortunately, so does his slick racing enemy, Elmo (Cesare Danova).

programme.title: Honolulu Lu
programme.desc: Well-meaning sailors and a conniving uncle place an entertainer (Lupe Velez) in the Miss Honolulu contest under two different identities.

programme.title: The Desert Trail
programme.desc: John Scott (John Wayne) is a rodeo rider, assisted by his buddy Kansas Charlie (Eddy Chandler). But while the duo is settling a debt with their promoter, Farnsworth (Henry Hall), thieves Pete (Al Ferguson) and Jim (Paul Fix) murder and rob Farnsworth and manage to pin the crimes on John and Charlie. The accused then flee, assume two new identities, take up with a shopkeeper named Anne (Mary Kornman) and set out to clear their names and bring the real killers to justice.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes connects a school chum's family ritual with a butler's disappearance.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate tries to restore the self confidence of Floyd Smoot after he is jilted by his mail-order sweetheart, by pretending to be in love with him.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: A musical in which a modern day Romeo and Juliet are involved in New York street gangs. On the harsh streets of the upper west side, two gangs battle for control of the turf. The situation becomes complicated when a gang members falls in love with a rival's sister.

programme.title: Viva Las Vegas

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Calamity Jane
programme.desc: In the lonely Deadwood, Dakota, territory, sharpshooter Calamity Jane (Doris Day) falls for cavalry Lt. Danny Gilmartin (Philip Carey) when she is forced to rescue him from the Indians. Recognizing that the women-starved townsmen long for a "real" woman, Calamity journeys to Chicago to bring back famous singer Adelaid Adams, but mistakenly brings her maid Katie instead. Heartbroken when Danny falls for Katie, Calamity all but ignores her jovial friend Wild Bill Hickok (Howard Keel).

programme.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
programme.desc: During the 1850s, Milly (Jane Powell), a pretty young cook, marries Adam (Howard Keel), a grizzled woodsman, after a brief courtship. When the two return to Adam's farm, Milly is shocked to meet his six ill-mannered brothers, all of whom live in his cabin. She promptly begins teaching the brothers proper behavior, and most importantly, how to court a woman. But after the brothers kidnap six local girls during a town barn-raising, a group of indignant villagers tries to track them down.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls
programme.desc: When Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) responded to an ad in New Mexico for a mail-order bride, she had no idea that her would-be husband was a broken-down cowhand. Instead of returning back home, she takes a job at the local Harvey House restaurant. But the new establishment faces tough resistance from the local saloon owner (John Hodiak) and the town's streetwise showgirl, Em (Angela Lansbury). As Susan works with the Harvey girls to win over the townsfolk, she also searches for a new love.

programme.title: Gidget Goes Hawaiian
programme.desc: In this sequel to the hit 1959 film "Gidget," Francie "Gidget" Lawrence (Deborah Walley) is once again involved with her boyfriend, Jeff "Moondoggie" Matthews (James Darren). However, they have a lovers' spat, and Gidget goes to sulk in Hawaii with her parents. In the islands, she meets TV dancer Eddie Horner (Michael Callan). Seeing how miserable she's become, Gidget's wise dad (Carl Reiner) sends for Moondoggie, and the couple reunite just as Gidget gets romantic with Eddie.

programme.title: Miss Annie Rooney
programme.desc: Teenager Annie Rooney (Shirley Temple) chafes at the lack of attention from her distracted boyfriend, Joey (Roland Dupree). One evening on the way to a party, Joey rear-ends the car of wealthy Marty White Jr. (Dickie Moore). Smitten, Annie accepts a ride from Marty to the party, where she delights him by teaching him to jitterbug. Annie begins dating Marty, but she is brought up short when his family refuses to invite her to his birthday party because of her working-class, eccentric father.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: A singing-cowboy congressman (Roy Rogers) goes to Washington to save ranchers from a power dam.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sir Eustace Brackenstall's wife tells Holmes she saw a gang murder her savage husband.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp investigates a stagecoach robbery involving $5,000 in silver dollars and becomes confounded when the driver's account of the incident proves false, and Hal subsequently finds the driver shot to death.

programme.title: Wild Horse
programme.desc: An expert is called in to tame a wild stallion in this affectionate tribute to Mutt, Hoot's beloved Palomino.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: Chauffeur's daughter Sabrina (Audrey Hepburn) returns home from two years in Paris a beautiful young woman, and immediately catches the attention of David (William Holden), the playboy son of her father's rich employers. David woos and wins Sabrina, who has always been in love with him, however their romance is threatened by David's serious older brother, Linus (Humphrey Bogart), who runs the family business and is relying on David to marry an heiress in order for a crucial merger to take place.

programme.title: Roll on Texas Moon
programme.desc: Cattle rancher Gabby Whittaker (George "Gabby" Hayes) is blamed for the murder of neighboring sheep rancher Matthew Delaney when he finds Delaney's body on the border between their spreads. Cattleman Roy Rogers (Roy Rogers) is sent to ease tensions between the two feuding ranches, and gains the confidence of Delaney's niece, Jill (Dale Evans), who has inherited his ranch. But her foreman, Steve Anders (Francis McDonald), aims to gain control of both ranches for himself.

programme.title: Born to the West
programme.desc: Dare Rudd (John Wayne) and Dinkey (Syd Saylor) are two friends who love to gamble. Needing money and shelter, they travel to Montana to visit Rudd's cousin, Tom (John Mack Brown), who owns a successful cattle ranch. Dare quickly falls for Tom's girlfriend Judy (Marsha Hunt), who convinces Tom to give Dare a chance to prove himself by running a cattle drive. When he loses the herd in a high-stakes poker game, Dare joins forces with Tom and Dinkey to get the cattle back.

programme.desc: Dog pain treatment; breed profile: Doberman.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids
programme.desc: "Biz Kids" is an educational television show that teaches financial education and entrepreneurship to a preteen audience. It uses sketch comedy and young actors to explain basic economic concepts.

programme.title: Sports Stars of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Profiles of the top rookie, college and high-school talent in sports; current athletes share their experiences, advice and personal impressions of the road to stardom.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Song of Texas
programme.desc: A singing rodeo star (Roy Rogers) loses half of a ranch and enters a chuck-wagon race to win it back.

programme.desc: A singing cowboy (Tex Ritter) saves his stranded medicine show by collecting back taxes for a commission.

programme.desc: Who was that masked man? The Lone Ranger, of course - sole survivor of a group of ambushed Texas Rangers, who was nursed back to health by Tonto, his trusty American Indian companion. The pair roam the Old West, defending the helpless against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.title: In the Press
programme.desc: Join presenters Dheepthika Laurent Solange Mougin and Alison Sargent as they show viewers all the latest and most interesting stories from the newspaper headlines in France and around the world.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: (2006) Comedy. Neighbours Matthew Broderick and Danny DeVito get extremely competitive as they festoon their houses with increasingly outrageous festive decorations and lights.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: (1942) Swashbuckling adventure with Laird Cregar and Tyrone Power. Privateer Captain Henry Morgan tries to rid the Caribbean of pirates when he's made Governor of Jamaica. Bit rich.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: (2019) Greta Gerwig's Oscar-winning period drama adaptation of the classic Louisa May Alcott novel, starring Emma Watson, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, Timothée Chalamet and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller. Denzel Washington stars as an ex-soldier who comes out of retirement to help a teenage sex worker who's been assaulted by her pimp.

programme.title: Withnail and I
programme.desc: (1987) Richard E Grant and Paul McGann star in Bruce Robinson's cult comedy as hard-drinking, substance-abusing unemployed actors who flee to Cumbria to escape their squalid London life.

programme.title: Walking and Talking
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy with Catherine Keener and Anne Heche. A successful woman's best friend is getting married - making her feel unlucky in love. But is everything as rosy as it at first seems?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: (1941) Screwball romcom with Barbara Stanwyck and Henry Fonda. A con artist is forced to change tack when she falls for her mark and he dumps her for trying to con him in the first place.

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: (1999) David Lynch's fact-based drama with Richard Farnsworth. Alvin Straight drives hundreds of miles across the USA on a lawnmower to visit his dying brother - Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: (2008) Remake of the sci-fi classic with Keanu Reeves. An alien visits Earth to tell humankind to stop destroying the planet. But when he's attacked, he decides to eradicate us instead...

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: (2011) Naughty kids are one thing but a naughty teacher? Can titular educator Cameron Diaz win a big-bucks teaching competition... and buy surgical enhancements to seduce Justin Timberlake?

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: It Came from Outer Space
programme.desc: (1953) Richard Carlson stars as an astronomer who sees an alien craft land. But nobody believes him - until the cloning starts in Jack Arnold's science-fiction classic.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: (1995) Charming family comedy-drama about a clever little pig who forms a close bond with a farmer and discovers a talent for herding sheep. With James Cromwell.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: (2020) Family action comedy. A CIA agent (Dave Bautista) gets the run-around from a nine-year-old girl when he's sent to keep an eye on her family. With Chloe Coleman.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: (2018) Revenge thriller with Jennifer Garner. A mum turns vigilante on a quest for justice when her husband and daughter are murdered by a drug cartel.

programme.title: Stand by Me
programme.desc: (1986) Four young friends (Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell) set out on an expedition into deepest Oregon in this coming-of-age tale based on a Stephen King story.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Sam Rockwell and Saoirse Ronan head a splendid ensemble for this comedy whodunnit that places a real murder among a production of Agatha Christie's The Mousetrap. With Adrien Brody.

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: (2023) Action with Henry Golding and Sam Neill. An assassin wants to retire for love, but his handler has entered him into a deadly game of hit the hitman. Can he survive to live his dream?

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.title: Birds of Passage
programme.desc: (2018) Hallucinatory drama charting the rise of the Colombian marijuana trade through its very immediate and profound effect on an indigenous Wayuu tribe. In Wayuu/Spanish/subs.

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Cult adventure comedy film starring Sean Astin and Josh Brolin, 1985. A group of young misfits discover an ancient map and set out to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: Classic romantic musical drama film starring Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Gray, 1987. A young woman spending the summer with her family at a resort falls for a dance instructor.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts as wine expert Olly Smith, comedian Jo Brand, and TV personality Vicky Pattison put their wits to the test in the hope of winning 20,000 pounds for charity.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Tom from Twickenham, Richard from Sheffield, Sam from High Wycombe and Gabriela from London join forces in an attempt to take home thousands of pounds.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray has a ghastly job ahead, a life is still very much at risk, and there is a dramatic end to the year.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit enlists Asha's help in his investigation, Ryan voices suspicions of Carl fiddling the hotel accounts, and Todd anxiously awaits Theo's arrival for New Year's Eve in the Rovers.

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Romantic comedy film starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, 1990. A wealthy businessman who hires an escort to join him at social events ends up falling in love with her.

programme.title: The Assembly: Unseen
programme.desc: This episode features unseen questions from The Assembly's grillings of David Tennant, Gary Lineker, Danny Dyer and Jade alongside more revelations from the interviewed stars.

programme.title: ITV News Inc New Year Bongs
programme.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

programme.title: It'll Be Alright on the Night
programme.desc: Tom Allen celebrates funny cock-ups from the world of entertainment featuring Idris Elba, Paul Rudd, Ant and Dec, Susanna Reid, Alan Carr and many more of our favourite stars.

programme.title: Westlife 25: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
programme.desc: Join Westlife at London's iconic Royal Albert Hall for a spectacular night of celebration as they mark an extraordinary 25 years at the top of British pop.

programme.title: The Big Quiz: Coronation Street vs Emmerdale
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern returns to host the ultimate soap showdown as two of ITV's biggest soaps go head-to-head to prove who knows their show best.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the eighth round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Sale v Harlequins, Bristol v Newcastle, Bath v Northampton and Exeter v Leicester.

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: Celebrate 2024's top 100 viral TikTok clips in this epic countdown packed with hilarious, shocking, and spectacular moments alongside a look at how much money these clips earned.

programme.title: Ant and Dec's Limitless Win Christmas Special
programme.desc: Ant and Dec spread the Christmas joy by surprising two audience members with the chance to take on the Limitless Ladder alongside celebrity teammates.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers
